document.full_text: gunmen thursday killed a senior iraqi politician who helped purge members of saddam hussein's banned baath party from politics in the latest of a wave of killings targeting politicians and officials.
document.title: gunmen kill iraqi official who purged saddam loyali
lines_and_colors: gunmen thursday killed a senior iraqi politician who helped purge members of saddam hussein's banned baath party from politics in the latest of a wave of killings targeting politicians and officials.
